description: Share My Feeling: This film will make you want to do your own thing, as these two studs separately do theirs. Both guys are hung over 9 inches with the greatest straight up into the air climaxes you've ever shared with anyone. You can really get into this one ? as you fantasize them getting into you. It's more than an experience ? it's a feeling! ***Note: This scene represents two solo scenes combined. One of the models is Joe Markum.
title: Teach Me, Scene #04
